thread.title: Barclays CEO Jes Staley Fined but Keeps Job After Whistleblower Probe

author: Max Colchester
title: Barclays CEO Jes Staley Fined but Keeps Job After Whistleblower Probe
text:
Barclays PLC Chief Executive Jes Staley will keep his job after British regulators concluded his attempts to unmask a whistleblower didn’t represent a “lack of integrity” and instead chose to slap the U.S. executive with a fine.
The London-based bank said it still backed Mr. Staley, ending a year of instability for the CEO and drawing a line under a major unknown that has weighed on Barclays as it looks to push on from a major restructuring. The case was also the first major test of the new U.K. “Senior Managers Regime,”...
